Title: WPF Chart Demo
Description: WPF Line Graph implemented in XAML mostly with minimum code behind.
HomeWiki:
WPF Chart Demo

Demonstrate how to implement charts in XAML techologies with minimum aditional code behind.


Using tecnologies:
  • XAML
  • Paths & Geometry
  • Items panels
  • Bindings & Multibindings
  • Converters (all functional code here)
  • Dependency objects & properties (all code behind here)
  • Styles & Templates
  • Recources

Code behid contains only dependency properties description. All logic such as data set visualisation implemented in styles, templates and converters.

Only Line Graph released
